name: bazel-testexplorer
description: A VS Code extension to run and manage Bazel tests.

commands.title: Bazel-TestExplorer: Show Metadata for Test Target

bazelTestExplorer.testTypes.description: List of Bazel test types to detect

bazelTestExplorer.queryPaths.description: List of relative Bazel paths (i.e. //tests) where tests should be queried. If left empty, defaults to querying the entire workspace ('//...').

bazelTestExplorer.sequentialTestTypes.description: List of test types (i.e. 'java_test') that should be run sequentially instead of in parallel.

bazelTestExplorer.testArgs.description: Additional command line arguments to pass to 'bazel test'. Example: ['--config=ci', '--build_tests_only', '--runs_per_test=2', etc.]

bazelTestExplorer.runsPerTest.description: Number of times Bazel should execute every test target (0 disables the flag).
bazelTestExplorer.runsPerTest.markdownDeprecationMessage: Configure this option via the Bazel Test Settings view.

bazelTestExplorer.runsPerTestDetectsFlak.description: Enable Bazel's --runs_per_test_detects_flakes flag to treat reruns as flake detection.
bazelTestExplorer.runsPerTestDetectsFlak.markdownDeprecationMessage: Configure this option via the Bazel Test Settings view.

bazelTestExplorer.nocacheTestResults.description: Apply --nocache_test_results so Bazel always re-runs tests instead of using cached results.
bazelTestExplorer.nocacheTestResults.markdownDeprecationMessage: Configure this option via the Bazel Test Settings view.

bazelTestExplorer.testStrategyExclusive.markdownDeprecationMessage: Configure this option via the Bazel Test Settings view.

bazelTestExplorer.failLinePatterns.description: Custom regular expressions to extract file and line from test failures. The first two capture groups must be filename and line number.

bazelTestExplorer.enableTestCaseDiscover.description: Experimental: Show individual test-cases per target by analysing Bazel's test.xml (can be slow).

bazelTestRunner.testCaseDiscoveryCacheMs.description: Time-to-live (ms) for cached individual test-case discovery results. Lower values rerun discovery sooner.

bazelTestExplorer.buildTestsOnly.description: Use Bazel's --build_tests_only to build targets without executing them.

bazelTestExplorer.verboseViewRegistratio.description: Developer: enable verbose activation diagnostics for view/container registration. Keep disabled for production to avoid slow activation.

bazelTestExplorer.verboseLogging.description: Enable verbose test event logging. Defaults to false to avoid flooding logs.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && tsc -p tsconfig.json && node esbuild.js
